widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 5), size = (670, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (10, 35), size = (670, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (650, 5), size = (48, 48), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (5, 58), size = (0, 0), png = 5), # index 4 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 17)], "itemHeight": 60 }

screen.name: DialogUpdateDelete
screen.title: AddOnManager
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 50, textsize[1] + 50) offset = 0 offset = 60 wsizex = textsize[0] + 60 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (280 > wsizex): wsizex = 280 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex, 50) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))
